attributes.action: Stop Student loans being taken as income for Univeral Credit
attributes.additional_details: Student loans have to be paid back , so as well as being penalised by universal credit and having income reduced for receiving them - we still have to pay the loans back . We do not have a choice to decline the maintenance loan as it is still taken as income anyway. We are being forced into debt. It is difficult , especially for parents , to find employment around changing university timetables. Students are being either forced into poverty or giving up their studies .
attributes.background: Stop taking maintenance loans as income for universal credit purposes or at least change the rules so that the entitlement is reduced by 63p per £1 instead of £1 for £1 just like earned income is . Students , especially parents , are being reduced to poverty or having to leave higher education.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553220
